mapper.select: SELECT '수강 신청이 완료되었습니다.' AS message, c.course_id, c.title, c.classroom, u.user_name AS professor, c.time, c.credit FROM course c JOIN user u ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.course_id = #{courseId}

SELECT c.course_id, c.title, c.classroom, u.name AS professor, c.time, c.credit
FROM enrollment e
JOIN course c ON e.course_id = c.course_id JOIN user u ON u.user_id = c.user_id
WHERE e.user_id = #{userId} AND c.year = #{year} AND c.semester = #{semester}
